channel.title: Packet Handling Issues
channel.description:
Hey there, I've been toying around with Xenorune and found that the examining of items on the equip items interface (the one with stat bonuses) is not handled, I handled this packet (which was 9) and got rid of the line that appears in the console saying that there is an unhandled packet. However this shows up:
[2013/11/30 08:19:21] [AnonymousIoService-2]: Unkown length: 9, guessed to be: 6.
And the examining isn't working. Im wondering what the hell this "unknown length: 9" stuff is and why it matters, cuz I handled the bloody packet.

item.title: Packet Handling Issues
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

are you reading the correct data? is this a problem with any other packets?

Read full topic
